mapper.delete: DELETE FROM 給与.就業時間 WHERE 従業員ID = #{employeeNumber.value} and 就業日 = #{workDate.value.value}
mapper.select: SELECT 就業時間.従業員ID as "employeeNumber.value", 就業時間.就業日 as "actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startDate.value.value", 就業時間.開始時刻 as "actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startTime.value.value", 就業時間.終了時刻 as "actualWorkDateTime.workRange.endTime.value.value", 就業時間.休憩時間 as "actualWorkDateTime.daytimeBreakTime.value.value", 就業時間.深夜休憩時間 as "actualWorkDateTime.nightBreakTime.value.value" FROM 給与.就業時間 as 就業時間 WHERE 就業時間.従業員ID = #{employeeNumber.value} AND to_char(就業時間.就業日,'yyyymm') = #{yearMonth}
